Name: Mouse The Mouse
Review: Absolutely the best VR game place in Toronto! Very clean environment with EXCELLENT staff. Highly recommend this place if you're new to the VR world -  if you ever get stuck or don't know how to operate something, the game master (staff) is watching the same screen you're viewing and they walk you through exactly what to do using their voice through the headphones you're wearing. My friend and I did 1 hour - and that was a perfect length! Maybe 1.5 hr max. Any more than that you'd start feeling a little dizzy and the head piece starts digging into your forehead a bit and hurts. Like others said in the review, the loading time between games is a bit long and can be slightly frustrating but overall the experience is fantastic! SUPER FUN and a perfect activity for dates, hangouts, birthday event, etc! We did an hour and was able to play 4 games! Not for very long in each one but at least a few rounds - we just wanted to try different games! You can choose the games based on difficulty levels which are clearly displayed, so it's easy to choose, and the game master can give you recommendations if you don't know where to start!
Responce: Hey Mouse the Mouse,' "Thank you so much for the awesome words! We are happy to hear that you had a great experience. We strive to provide the best customer service possible so that you will enjoy your time here at our arcade. It's because of reviews like yours, we are inspired to strive more for the satisfaction of our clients! Our staff are highly trained to assist and make sure our customers needs are met. We're also glad to hear you were able to play 4 games! That's amazing! We also have events for groups whenever there's an occasion to celebrate! Come back soon and our staff can recommend more games to choose from. Thanks again for your review and we hope to see you again soon!" 'Levelup Reality

Name: Adas Tenkie
Review: Totally worth it,  I never tried VR before and it was a lot of fun! I look forward to coming back!

Name: Heather Walker
Review: So much fun, lovely staff!

Name: Ben Farrall
Review: If you haven't tried VR, stop what you're doing and book an hour here. Have a friend join you for some multiplayer action or get immersed in one of the awesome experiences, especially Rick and Morty. The staff here are super friendly and helpful and they will even give you tips if you're getting stuck on something. You'll not be disappointed and like me you'll definitely be going back for another go.

Name: Andrew Couto
Review: Awesome place! Really helpful and friendly staff! I recommend it to all !

Name: Helen Huynh
Review: I would definitely recommend this place for VR gaming and it was definitely worth it's value. The place, itself is very clean and the equipment they use is high quality (no lag and the resolution was perfect).  I was blown away with the wonderful service as well as the gaming experience itself!

Name: Joseph Malunay
Review: Amazing experience. I can see why they're 5 stars. They are all about the user experience and guide you through every single game. I'll definitely come back.

Name: ornella ferrere
Review: We had so much fun!! The place is very clean, the games are FUN and William  (He was assisting us) was nice and knowledgeable. We paid 30$ for 30 minutes. Honestly it was totally worth the price. We will go back for sure, even because my son wants to have his bday party at that location. 5 stars hands down

Name: Chris Au
Review: Awesome place! William and friends always go above and beyond to make sure you have a blast

Name: Doug Salomon
Review: I've been there a few times with my kids, and we definitely plan on going again.

Name: Shayley “the” Harris
Review: Great Staff, great times, and an overall wonderful experience!

Name: Mark
Review: A lot of fun for my girlfriend and I and the staff was super helpful in making sure we understood the games and what was going on. Will definitely be coming back for more

Name: Terry Gunness
Review: 1 adult, 2 kids had an amazing experience. Staff were friendly and extremely helpful. Clean environment. Will be going again soon.

Name: Jonathan Ramdial
Review: Excellent service and a great time

Name: Jeff Chan
Review: This was my first time trying a VR experience (besides at the Rec Room) and it was really fun. This place has plenty of games to choose from (single or multiplayer) and the staff were very friendly and helpful in guiding us through the process!

Name: Jean-Francois Lavigne
Review: Great staff to support any lurning curve you might need!

Name: Todd Griffin
Review: I could not recommend this place more for a good time. Go for the hour because you'll want it. Get ready to learn what immersion really is. William is great for teaching beginners and aiding the experienced.

Name: Adeel Rizvi
Review: Loved the experience. I had some previous experience in virtual reality but it was nothing compared to the HTC vive that level up is stocked with. They have a huge library of games for every type of person. The service is really good. They help you through the more difficult games and help set up each game as fast as possible to make the most of your time. It's a small place but when your in the virtual world it doesn't even matter.

Name: O
Review: Great for a date, going out with friends or even alone. I will be heading there for the third time this month.

Name: Dianne Rigato
Review: The staff are incredible. They took the time to help our 8 yr old daughter get used to the controls, select, and play games. They are ready to jump in and help you without even asking for help. The games were very fun. This was  my second time at Level Up and both times were great!

Name: Cameron Dimock
Review: Very friendly and helpful staff. I went with 3 friends and it was a great time. So many games of all different genres so there is really something for everyone.

Name: Allison Sosnoski
Review: My boyfriend and I went yesterday, each for a 1 hour session. I'm not much of a gamer so I was worried an hour would be too much, but we both had a total blast! The game selection was great (at least for us beginners), and we didn't want to leave. It is a bit dizzying at times, so I don't know how it would feel for someone with more motion sickness than me, but it's overall a super accessible and fun setup. I wish we'd remembered the names of the man and woman that assisted us, they were both amazing! They were extremely knowledgeable about the system, and offered tips and advice without being intrusive. I do  remember that we spoke with William on the phone before coming, and he was also very helpful and considerate with helping us figure out how to use our gift vouchers. We're definitely coming back. Thanks!!

Name: Johnathan Rutherford
Review: We had an amazing time! The service was great and staff was very informative. The session started with a short about 5 minute tutorial. From that point we were able to decide the types of games we wanted to play. We chose to do multiplayer and play together. The staff helped explained each game in a quick and efficient manner right before each one which was helpful, but then let us do our thing after that unless we needed them. The price point felt very good for the experience!

Name: Mande
Review: Friendly, patient and helpful staff. Clean space and high grade equipment makes for an enjoyable experience. I highly recommend to anyone for a date, lunchtime break or just a day out. Stop in and bring your friends.

Name: Jiang Duan
Review: I took my son there and he really love it. He was obsessed with the office virtual game, in which he got the task to place the items into the right places in a virtual office environment. We definitely will come back again. The staff was really friendly and helpful.

Name: Salimah Ismail
Review: One of the coolest things I have done in a long time.  Great staff, awesome experience!

Name: Vincent Yuen
Review: The VR equipment was also clean and state-of-the-art, and ran the games extremely well.  Would definitely recommend to others!

Name: Steph deus
Review: Reminds me of the old gamecube day with friends playing 007 and Halo (VR Pavlov comes close). Definitely recommend groups and friends!

Name: Zack Brown
Review: P.S. Shoutout to William, who's actually just the best.

Name: Gary Rose
Review: It was a birthday gift, and my first time. Totally amazing!!!  I must go again!!

Name: Kristyn Felushko
Review: Went as a date and had a super fun time!!

Name: Edward Maropakis
Review: Fantastic experience!  The staff was friendly and attentive and the game play was incredible!  6 stars out of 5!
